overview:
Jon Nance is a co-founder and President of Exervio Management Consulting. In addition to Jonâ€™s day to day operational responsibilities for the headquarters office, Jon has oversight of strategy, communication and the overall financial growth of the firm. As Exervioâ€™s President, Jon relies on a few simple philosophies to build and guide the business:

Create a place where people want to work. Be a company with whom clients like to do business. Success is a journey, not a destination. Communicate, collaborate and operate as a team. All oars in the water!
